瑑字的基本解释

瑑
zhuàn
玉器上雕刻的凸起的花纹：“瑑圭璋八寸。”
在玉器上雕刻凸起的花纹：“臣闻良玉不瑑，资质润美，不待刻瑑。”

瑑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuàn］
［《廣韻》持兖切，上獮，澄。］
(1)玉器上隆起的雕纹。
(2)指雕刻瑑纹或文字。
[②]［wèi］
［《字彙補》于貴切］
“璏1”的讹字。

瑑字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑑； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页737第11
【唐韻】直戀切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】柱戀切，?音傳。【說文】圭璧上起兆瑑也。【徐曰】瑑，謂起爲攏，若篆文之形。【周禮·春官·典瑞】瑑圭璋璧琮。【註】瑑有圻鄂瑑起。【前漢·董仲舒傳】良玉不瑑。【註】謂瑑琢刻爲文也。　又【廣韻】持兗切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】柱兗切，?音篆。又【集韻】柱允切，音蜳。又?尼切，音墀。義?同。

1、玉器上隆起的雕纹；2、指雕刻瑑纹或文字。

Basic explanation of words
engraved lines
zhuàn
The raised pattern carved on the jade: "Eight Cun Rong Kyizhang."
Carving a raised pattern on the jade article: "Chen Wenliang jade is not a good jade, and the qualifications are so beautiful, no need to carve the jade."
engraved lines
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuàn］
["Guangyun" is cut, upright and clear. ]
(1) The raised carvings on the jade.
(2) Refers to carved patterns or characters.
[②]［wèi］
["Zihuibu" Yu Guiqie]
The wrong word of "璏1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瑑; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 737 No. 11
[Tang Yun] Straight Love Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Zhu Love Cut,? Sound Biography. [Said the text] Zhao Yu also got up on Guibi. [Xu Yue] Yuan, which means that the beginning is close, like the form of seal script. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan·Dianrui】Lang Guizhang Bicong. [Note] There is a Qi and Hubei Qi. [Previous Han·Dong Zhongshu Biography] Good jade is not good. [Note] It is said that Zhuo Zhuo is engraved as a text.　 [Guang Yun] with Yan cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Zhu Yan cut,? Sound seal. Also [Jiyun] Zhu Yun cuts, the sound is scorpion. Again? Niche, Yinchi. Righteous? Same.
